member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualC.DebugInfoInPDBAttribute
member.summary: An attribute applied to native classes that tells the debugger to look up field information in the pdb rather than in metadata.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualC.DebugInfoInPDBAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualC.DecoratedNameAttribute
member.summary: An attribute used by the compiler to pass the decorated name of a method to the linker.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualC.DecoratedNameAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualC.DecoratedNameAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified decorated name.
member.param: The decorated name of a method.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualC.MiscellaneousBitsAttribute
member.summary: An attribute that stores miscellaneous information about a type in metadata.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualC.MiscellaneousBitsAttribute.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified bit mask.
member.param: A bit mask containing information about a type.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualC.MiscellaneousBitsAttribute.m_dwAttrs
member.summary: A bit mask containing information about a type.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualC.NeedsCopyConstructorModifier
member.summary: A custom modifier applied to parameters that tells the CLR marshaler to call the parameter's copy constructor when marshaling the parameter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualC.NeedsCopyConstructorModifier.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
